response.overview: This story is about a resort, which is possessed by an evil spirit. And there some friends go for a holiday, and slowly one by one people starts dying. After some time, Sameer learns that there is no ghost, it is a planned conspiracy and then Sameer exposes a criminal. And slowly the truth starts coming out with more twist and turns. This story is based on love and revenge with cliff-hanger and twists.
response.title: Blind Ghost
